headline: Royal Caribbean (RCL): Valuation Check After Crown Bay Redevelopment Deal, Dividend Hike and New Buyback Program
summary: Royal Caribbean Cruises (RCL) is back in the spotlight after striking a landmark deal to redevelop the Crown Bay District in St. Thomas, alongside rolling out fresh capital return plans for shareholders. See our latest analysis for Royal Caribbean Cruises. Against this backdrop of port redevelopment, buybacks, and a freshly affirmed dividend, Royal Caribbean’s 1 month share price return of 14.68 percent has helped lift the stock to 293.59 dollars. Its 3 year total shareholder return of 497.98...
